name: Hotel for Dogs
description:
The dogs have run amok and now it's up to you to keep them from the
pesky dogcatcher. You must clean, feed, and play with them or else
you'll all end up in the doghouse.
Search for parts and tools to build over a dozen amazing gadgets that
help you take care of and protect your dogs

Feed, groom, and play with dozens of playful pups

10 levels of challenging game play
